isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE, FENDERS AND BUMPER - 7000 - 7000 Model Series - FENDERS

svcproc.title: FENDERS
svcproc.para: Fenders are part of the two-piece bonded tilt type hood assembly on the 7000 series vehicles. All model hoods have fender extensions which are mounted to the lower forward cab structure. The valance sections at the forward lower section of the front end ( Figure 9, Items 4 and 5) differ in size depending on the vehicle type. The 7300 series in all models require the shorter valances shown in Item 4. The 7400 and 7500 models are equipped with either the set forward axle or set back axle depending on the vehicle application. The option may then be either Item 5 (set back option) or Item 4 (set forward option). The valance sections on the 7600 series are also set forward or set back configuration based on the vehicle application. Side fenderettes extend over the fender wheel well opening and are a separate option assembly attached to the fender and fender valance ( Figure 10, Item 4).
